QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, nmc_integrations.id odf_pk, nmc_integrations.code as code, nmc_integrations.proxy_user_name as proxy_user_name, nmc_integrations.user_name as user_name, odf_ca_integration.agl_create_direction as agl_create_direction, odf_ca_integration.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_integration.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, nmc_integrations.integration_supplier_code as integration_supplier, nmc_integrations.integration_vendor_code as integration_vendor, odf_ca_integration.agl_ctr_def_own_id as agl_ctr_def_own_id, odf_ca_integration.agl_tsk_chargecode as agl_tsk_chargecode, odf_ca_integration.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, case when nmc_integrations.password IS NOT NULL then '********' else nmc_integrations.password end as password, nmc_integrations.endpoint_url as endpoint_url, nmc_integrations.integration_area_code as integration_area, NMC_INTEGRATIONS.last_updated_date as last_updated_date, odf_ca_integration.agl_prj_template as agl_prj_template, nmc_integrations.proxy_port as proxy_port, nmc_integrations.auth_type as auth_type, odf_ca_integration.agl_ctr_def_prj_id as agl_ctr_def_prj_id, nmc_integrations.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, odf_ca_integration.agl_integration_type as agl_integration_type, odf_ca_integration.agl_team_sync as agl_team_sync, case when nmc_integrations.proxy_user_password IS NOT NULL then '********' else nmc_integrations.proxy_user_password end as proxy_user_password, nmc_integrations.proxy_server as proxy_server, created.full_name as created_by, odf_ca_integration.agl_team_is_open as agl_team_is_open, nmc_integrations.integration_instance as integration_instance, case when nmc_integrations.api_key IS NOT NULL then '********' else nmc_integrations.api_key end as api_key, odf_ca_integration.agl_tsk_sync as agl_tsk_sync, nmc_integrations.name as name, updated.full_name as updated_by, odf_ca_integration.agl_ctr_prj_pi_type as agl_ctr_prj_pi_type, odf_ca_integration.agl_is_open as agl_tsk_isopen, NMC_INTEGRATIONS.created_date as created_date, odf_ca_integration.partition_code as partition_code, nmc_integrations.referrer_url as referrer_url, odf_ca_integration.agl_ctr_tsk_pi_type as agl_ctr_tsk_pi_type, odf_ca_integration.agl_tsk_costtype as agl_tsk_costtype, odf_ca_integration.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from odf_ca_integration odf_ca_integration, NMC_INTEGRATIONS, SRM_RESOURCES CREATED, SRM_RESOURCES UPDATED where NMC_INTEGRATIONS.CREATED_BY = CREATED.USER_ID AND NMC_INTEGRATIONS.LAST_UPDATED_BY = UPDATED.USER_ID and nmc_integrations.id = odf_ca_integration.id
